title: Can your Freckles…disappear?
description:
Are you ready for an amazing after-school ocean adventure with the Trusty Narrator? Join Sea Camp Live October 18, 19 and 20 at 4:30PM for our special pre-sale price of less than $100 - offer good until October 4! Kids have said “This is the best camp ever” and parents say “Finally something educational for my kid -that they actually enjoy!” Click here to join now!

Also, we are so happy to invite you to check out our friends at the National Children's Museum new season of their science, technology, and engineering podcast adventure for kids , STEAM Daydream. Search for STEAM Daydream in your podcast app or check out their website.

In this episode of Who Smarted?, you’re going to get familiar with freckles! Do you have any? (Yes..you probably do!) What causes Freckles? Do other kinds of animals get Freckles? Can Freckles protect your skin?

Do you want to hear your name and review on the show? Then take a minute now and leave us a five star review with your name (First name only is great!) and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode of Who Smarted? Plus, leaving reviews helps us grow the podcast by getting in front of more listeners.

Thanks Smartypants!

And don’t forget, our free newsletter is FULL of special activities, exclusive messages from the Trusty Narrator, and tons more fun learning . Sign up for the Who Smarted? at www.WhoSmarted.com.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
